entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Becoming a few clouds after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
